Cast XML as data.table

Source: R/cabocha-parser.R
ppn_as_tokenindex.Rd

Cast XML as data.table

ppn_as_tokenindex(tokens)

Arguments

tokens

Output from pipian::ppn_parse_xml.

Value

A data.table casted with rsyntax::as_tokenindex is returned.

Examples

xml <- ppn_parse_xml(system.file("sample.xml", package = "pipian"))
head(ppn_as_tokenindex(xml))

#>    doc_id sentence token_id            token chunk_score
#> 1:      1        1     1100              EOS          NA
#> 2:      1        1     1110 <U+3042><U+308B>    1.386597
#> 3:      1        1     1121         <U+65E5>    1.386597
#> 4:      1        1     1122         <U+306E>    1.386597
#> 5:      1        1     1133         <U+4E8B>    0.000000
#> 6:      1        1     1134         <U+3067>    0.000000
